thread.title: Japan's Nikkei share average falls below 17,450.77, wiping out year-to-date gains
thread.title_full: Japan's Nikkei share average falls below 17,450.77, wiping out year-to-date gains | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Japan's Nikkei share average falls below 17,450.77, wiping out year-to-date gains
text:
Sept 8 Japan's Nikkei share average fell below 17,450.77 on Tuesday, wiping out year-to-date gains.
The benchmark Japanese index lost 2.5 percent to 17,416.12 and remained volatile in late afternoon trading. (Reporting by Joshua Hunt; Editing by Chang-Ran Kim )
